summary: This document is a written consent of the sole director of Hyperion Air, Inc. to adopt resolutions regarding the appointment of corporate officers. Jeffrey E. Epstein is appointed as President, with Darren K. Indyke as Vice President and Secretary, and Richard Kahn as Treasurer. The document also states the removal of any prior officers not elected under this resolution.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is appointed as the President of Hyperion Air, Inc.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is appointed as both Vice President and Secretary of Hyperion Air, Inc.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is appointed as the Treasurer of Hyperion Air, Inc.

persons.name: Frey E. Epstein
persons.context: Frey E. Epstein is the sole director who executed the written consent for the resolutions.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as President, oversees Darren K. Indyke, who is appointed as Vice President and Secretary.
Jeffrey E. Epstein, as President, oversees Richard Kahn, who is appointed as Treasurer.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are both appointed officers of Hyperion Air, Inc.

keyFacts: The document is a written consent of the sole director of Hyperion Air, Inc. dated January 2, 2012.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is appointed as President of Hyperion Air, Inc.
Darren K. Indyke is appointed as both Vice President and Secretary.
Richard Kahn is appointed as Treasurer.
The document states the removal of any prior officers not elected under the new resolutions.
